name: sol
description: TypeScript AST viewer and Advance Query editor

scripts.start: npx http-server docs &  export NODE_ENV=development ; npx watch  "npm run build-dev" src
scripts.build-dev: export NODE_ENV=development ; parcel build src/index.html -d docs  --no-minify --no-content-hash  --no-source-maps
scripts.build: npm run clean && npx tsc && export NODE_ENV=production && sh build-workers.sh && parcel build src/index.html -d docs --no-content-hash --detailed-report --public-url './'

author: Sebasti√°n Gurin
